title: Real Prayer
itunes:title: Real Prayer
description: Irish writer Iris Murdoch says that the rarest and best moments in life occur when the web of our egotism and self-absorption is broken through. This can happen through great art and great compassion. It can also happen through authentic prayer, modelled by the publican in Jesus' famous parable.

This can happen through great art and great compassion. It can also happen through authentic prayer, modelled by the publican in Jesus' famous parable.
